700600f-a.text:
Bronx Boulevard, west side, north from Burke Avenue. The Boulevard runs on top of the stone wall and shows the W.P.A. conducting repair work. The view is from the Bronx River Parkway
(left).
March 19, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
700600f-a.folder: Bronx Boulevard & Burke Avenue, Bronx, NY

700634f-a.title: Bronx: Bronx Park East - Burke Avenue
700634f-a.text:
Bronx Park East, west side, at Burke Avenue, showing a
W.P.A. highway project.
May 17, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
